home.headline: Find Your
home.subtitle: Search 40,000+ verified doctors, dentists, and pharmacists across Nepal. Find the right healthcare professional for your needs.
home.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, specialty, or location...
home.doctorsDescription: Find registered medical practitioners across Nepal
home.dentistsDescription: Connect with dental professionals near you
home.pharmacistsDescription: Locate licensed pharmacists for medication advice
home.symptomCheckerDescription: Use our symptom checker to find the right medical specialty based on your symptoms.

footer.tagline: Nepal's comprehensive healthcare directory. Find verified doctors, dentists, and pharmacists across the country.

search.title: Search Results
search.noResultsDescription: Try adjusting your search terms or browse by category

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

auth.termsNotice: By creating an account, you agree to our
auth.errorOAuthNotLinked: This email is already associated with another account
auth.errorGeneric: An error occurred during sign in
auth.errorPasswordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
auth.successAccountCreated: Account created successfully! Signing you in...

metadata.siteDescription: Find verified doctors, dentists, and pharmacists in Nepal. Search 40,000+ registered healthcare professionals with NMC, NDA, and NPC credentials.

claim.title: Claim Your Profile
claim.subtitle: Search for your profile by registration number to start the verification process
claim.noResults: No professional found with this registration number
claim.alreadyClaimed: This profile has already been claimed
claim.loginRequired: Please log in to claim a profile
claim.claimInstructions: After clicking the button below, you will be asked to submit verification documents to prove your identity.

verification.title: Verify Your Identity
verification.subtitle: Please upload the required documents to verify your identity and claim this profile
verification.governmentIdHelp: Upload a clear photo of your citizenship card, passport, or driver license
verification.dragDrop: Drag and drop or click to upload
verification.maxFileSize: Maximum file size: 10MB. Accepted formats: JPG, PNG, PDF
verification.successMessage: Your verification request has been submitted successfully. Our team will review your documents and get back to you within 2-3 business days.
verification.errorSubmit: Failed to submit verification request. Please try again.
verification.errorAlreadyClaimed: This profile has already been claimed
verification.errorAlreadyPending: You already have a pending verification request for this profile

profile.title: Edit Profile
profile.subtitle: Update your professional profile information
profile.name: Name
profile.bioPlaceholder: Write a short bio about yourself and your practice...
profile.bioHelp: Maximum 1000 characters. Tell patients about your experience and expertise.
profile.consultationFeeHelp: Your standard consultation fee in Nepali Rupees
profile.errorSave: Failed to save profile. Please try again.
profile.noProfileMessage: You haven't claimed a professional profile yet. Search for your profile and claim it to edit your information.
profile.loginRequired: Please log in to edit your profile

claims.title: Claims Dashboard
claims.subtitle: Review and manage profile verification requests
claims.confirmApprove: Are you sure you want to approve this claim?
claims.confirmReject: Are you sure you want to reject this claim?
claims.accessDeniedMessage: You do not have permission to access this page.
claims.loginRequired: Please log in to access this page

register.title: Register Your Clinic
register.subtitle: Add your clinic to Nepal's healthcare directory
register.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid Nepali phone number
register.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
register.loginRequired: Please log in to register a clinic

instant.title: Instant Consultation
instant.subtitle: Connect with available doctors now
instant.noAvailableDoctorsDescription: Check back later or browse scheduled consultations
instant.requestExpiredDescription: The doctor did not respond in time. Try another doctor.
instant.requestRejectedDescription: The doctor is unable to take your consultation right now.
instant.confirmRequestDescription: You are about to request an instant consultation with
instant.chiefComplaintPlaceholder: Describe your symptoms or concerns briefly...
instant.loginRequired: Please log in to start an instant consultation

symptomChecker.title: Symptom Checker
symptomChecker.subtitle: Select your symptoms to find the right medical specialist. Choose from the body areas below to get started.
symptomChecker.disclaimer: This tool provides general guidance only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult a qualified healthcare provider for medical concerns.
symptomChecker.emptyState: Select one or more symptoms from the left to see matching specialties.
symptomChecker.noMatches: No matching specialties found for the selected symptoms.
symptomChecker.advice: If you are experiencing a medical emergency, please call emergency services or visit the nearest hospital immediately.
